title: 1995 Isuzu Tilt Cab Utility Truck With Liftmore 3200lb Capacity Crane
item_description:
1995 Isuzu Tilt Cab Utility Truck With Liftmore 3200lb Capacity Crane

Specifications

  • Year: 1995
  • Make: Isuzu
  • Model: TB Utility Truck
  • VIN: 4KLB4B1A6SJ001909
  • License: 95193W2
    • Registration Expiration: 9/30/2025
    • Seller Placed in Planned Non-Op 9/29/2025
  • Odometer reads: 151,426 
  • Key: Available
  • GVWR: 13250
  • Body Style: Utility Truck
  • Fuel Type: Gasoline
  • Transmission: Automatic
  • Tire Size: Lt235/85r16
  • Deck Length: 140”
  • Deck Width: 49”
  • Wall Height: 23”

Exterior

  • Exterior Color: White
  • Doors: Two Door

Interior

  • Interior Material: Other
  • Interior Color: Other
  • Removal Note: this lot is to be picked up last day of removal.

Note: This vehicle is being sold on behalf of an estate. Certificate of Title, Transfer Form, Death Certificate, and transfer without probate will be mailed approximately 1-2 weeks after auction removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The estate sells this vehicle "as-is" in unknown running condition and in planned non-operational registration; no smog will be performed by the estate. The Buyer agrees to purchase the vehicle "as-is" and agrees to repair and smog the vehicle. An "as-is" no-smog bill of sale must be signed by both the administrator of the estate and the buyer in an agreement to these stated terms. Buyer accepts they are fully responsible for all aspects of smog, repairs to smog, transfer, registration, taxes, and fees due to the California DMV.
